item.title: New paper: Occupancy data at different spatial resolutions: Building energy performance and model calibration
item.description: We have a new paper: Adrian Chong, Godfried Augenbroe and Da Yan (2021). Occupancy data at different spatial resolutions: Building energy performance and model calibration. Applied Energy. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.apenergy.2021.116492 Occupancy is a significant area of interest within the field of building performance simulation. Through Bayesian calibration, the present study investigates the impact of the availability of different spatial resolution of occupancy data on the gap between predicted and measured energy use in buildings.

item.title: Continuous-time Bayesian calibration of energy models using BIM and energy data
Bayesian calibration of building energy models with large datasets
